so why lambda and Kinesis so we there's some real advantages to the
microservices architecture here of course these are generally general pros
for micro services is that you can replace these components this was particularly important to us because we
had we wanted to be able to replace planet stream somewhere down the line
with something that was a little bit more scalable and easier because right now we're relying on this other API to
provide the geometries that's not entirely stable and we also wanted to do some historical processing so planets
dream is focused on getting up to date minute by minute changes but we wanted to go back in time a few years at some
point and be able to update the database with data over over the last several years and so this was appealing to us
because we could replace the parts as needed and the lambda function and the Kinesis dream could stay exactly the
same as they were whatever we could whatever we wanted to add into the stream would automatically get processed
by lambda and added to our database so we could simultaneously be running planet stream to get these real
